title: Laughing Buddha
typeOfFood: Lacto, Pizza, Western, Beer/Wine, Take-out, Catering, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. The vegetarian food includes pizzas, sandwiches, salads, appetizers, falafel, hummus platter, and soup of the day. Offers vegan cheese for pizzas. Wide range of beverages, including beers from all over the world. The kitchen is careful not to contaminate vegetarian toppings with the meat - be specific. Lights and heaters can be used at night on the patio and in slightly chillier weather.
